page.title: 16St.Margarets,Ventnor.
page.content: I live in St.Margarets which is in Lowtherville,near Ventnor.Most of the area is downs but there are some roads with 2 shops,1 factory, 2 schools and the main road to Newport. Trans-Atlantic Plastics is a factory making goods made of rubber and plastic.It is 29 years old ,before that it used to be an R.A.F station. Ventnor Middle School used to be a secondary school for 11-16 year olds.Now there are 480 children between 9-16 years.St.Margarets School was also a part of the R.A.F. station. There are 80 children aged 4-9 at the school. There are 2 shops in the area.Janes is a hairdresers,the other sells coal and food. I like living in St.Margarets because of the downs where there are lots of camps for me to play in.
